com.cafbit.netlib.dns

类 DNSBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafbit.netlib.dns.DNSBuffer

  • public class DNSBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulate a byte buffer which maintains its own traversal state and provides several utility methods useful for consuming or producing the binary fields.
    作者:
    simmons
